name: Seven Bullets Zombie Apocalypse
description: Oldschool infinite runner. Try to survive with your trusty rifle and remaining 7 bullets in a clip, in a world after the zombie apocalypse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse
